review: Works great, nice list of shows.  However what says is free like HBO to go, and some other channels are not when you download. Should be able to view amazon prime shows from the site however not able to view on firestick.
author: Darla Callahan

review: Works great but you have two pay for everything  that's any good

review: Previously used chrome, this is easy better!  As amazon prime member I watch a lot of the free shows offered through prime. We have this on our daughters TV, cheaper than satellite fee per room.. This is free!!  Very easy just plug and play.  There is a short video at the beginning to brief you and then you are good to go!
author: Dotti Spillman

review: THERE ARE NOT 100'S OF MOVIES  YOU HAVE TO PAY FOR THE MAJORITY  TV SHOWS YOU HAVE TO PAY FOR HULA ETC.  IT IS NOT AS ADVERTISED  I SHOULD HAVE NONE BETTER.
author: NANCY SULLIVAN
